title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
2 points maximum

Description (1 point)

· As salinity increases la p 94 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3AAD@ frequency increases

· As salinity decreases la p 94 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3AAD@ frequency decreases

Prediction (1 point)

· Between 13 and 16 percent (or a selected value between 13 and 16 percent)

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
2 points maximum

Describe effect of LAP 94 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@39FA@ activity (1 point)

· LAP 94 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@39FA@ increases osmolarity/solute concentration of the cytosol

· LAP 94 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@39FA@ decreases water potential of the cytosol

Describe function of LAP 94 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@39FA@ in maintaining water balance (1 point)

· Prevents water loss to the environment

title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
3 points maximum

Explanation (1 point)

· Mussels with la p 94 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3AAD@ allele are more likely to survive in high salinity/less likely to survive in low salinity.

· Mussels without la p 94 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3AAD@ allele are less likely to survive in high salinity/more likely to survive in low salinity.

Prediction (1 point)

· Mussel population will increase in high salinity.

· Mussel population will decline in low salinity.

Justification (1 point)

· Mussels in high salinity with la p 94 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3AAD@ allele will osmoregulate.

· Mussels in low salinity with la p 94 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3AAD@ allele will not osmoregulate.
